results.title: Simvastatin Downregulates the SARS-CoV-2-Induced Inflammatory Response and Impairs Viral Infection Through Disruption of Lipid Rafts
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Downregulates the @SPECIES_2697049 @@@SARS-CoV-2@@@-Induced @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@Inflammatory@@@ Response and Impairs @<m>DISEASE_Virus_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014777 @@@Viral Infection@@@ Through Disruption of @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@Lipid@@@ Rafts

results.title: Screening and druggability analysis of some plant metabolites against SARS-CoV-2: An integrative computational approach
results.text_hl: In addition, two other biologically active compounds, @CHEMICAL_Mupirocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016712 @@@Mupirocin@@@ (DB00410) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (DB00641) could be an option for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Virus_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014777 @@@viral infections@@@.
